paragraphs.body: So, how should we standardize this? Currently, Mako and Bolin are in this category and not in the Earth Kingdom and Fire Nation categories, Chief Bei Fong is in this category and the Earth Kingdom category, and Tenzin and his children are in the Air Nomad and Water Tribe categories and not this category. Should United Republic characters be in this category only or should we also include them in the categories of their ancestral nations? -- Noneofyourbusiness (talk • contribs) 17:50, August 3, 2011 (UTC)
